title: Cryptic exception when accidentally reusing the same parameter instance in dynamically-constructed query
body:
The next code:

```
Expression<Func<Tenant, bool>> condition1 = t => t.Name == "A";
Expression<Func<Tenant, bool>> condition2 = t => t.Name == "B";

var parameterExpr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Tenant), "t");
var combinedExpr = Expression.OrElse(
    Expression.Invoke(condition1, parameterExpr),
    Expression.Invoke(condition2, parameterExpr)
);

Expression<Func<Tenant, bool>> combinedCondition = Expression.Lambda<Func<Tenant, bool>>(
    Expression.OrElse(
        Expression.Invoke(condition1, condition2.Parameters),
        Expression.Invoke(condition2, condition2.Parameters)
    ),
    condition2.Parameters
);

var query = db.Tenants.Where(combinedCondition);

var result = query.ToList();
```

It seems it works as expected: it returns two tenants with names A and B. But if I try to do `var sqlText = query.ToQueryString();` I get an exception `System.ArgumentException: 'An item with the same key has already been added. Key: t'`

With stack trace:
```
   at System.ThrowHelper.ThrowAddingDuplicateWithKeyArgumentException[T](T key) in /_/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/ThrowHelper.cs
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.TryInsert(TKey key, TValue value, InsertionBehavior behavior) in /_/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Collections/Generic/Dictionary.cs
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Add(TKey key, TValue value) in /_/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Collections/Generic/Dictionary.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareLambda(LambdaExpression a, LambdaExpression b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.Compare(Expression left, Expression right) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareInvocation(InvocationExpression a, InvocationExpression b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.Compare(Expression left, Expression right) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareBinary(BinaryExpression a, BinaryExpression b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.Compare(Expression left, Expression right) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareLambda(LambdaExpression a, LambdaExpression b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.Compare(Expression left, Expression right) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareUnary(UnaryExpression a, UnaryExpression b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.Compare(Expression left, Expression right) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareExpressionList(IReadOnlyList`1 a, IReadOnlyList`1 b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.CompareMethodCall(MethodCallExpression a, MethodCallExpression b) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.ExpressionComparer.Compare(Expression left, Expression right) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.ExpressionEqualityComparer.Equals(Expression x, Expression y) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/ExpressionEqualityComparer.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.CompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.CompiledQueryCacheKey.Equals(CompiledQueryCacheKey other) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/CompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.RelationalCompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.RelationalCompiledQueryCacheKey.Equals(RelationalCompiledQueryCacheKey other) in /_/src/EFCore.Relational/Query/RelationalCompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Query.Internal.SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKey.Equals(SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKey other) in /_/src/EFCore.SqlServer/Query/Internal/SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Query.Internal.SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKey.Equals(Object obj) in /_/src/EFCore.SqlServer/Query/Internal/SqlServerCompiledQueryCacheKeyGenerator.cs
   at System.Collections.Generic.ObjectEqualityComparer`1.Equals(T x, T y) in /_/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Collections/Generic/EqualityComparer.cs
   at System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2.TryGetValue(TKey key, TValue& value) in /_/src/libraries/System.Collections.Concurrent/src/System/Collections/Concurrent/ConcurrentDictionary.cs
   at Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.MemoryCache.TryGetValue(Object key, Object& result) in /_/src/libraries/Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory/src/MemoryCache.cs
   at Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheExtensions.TryGetValue[TItem](IMemoryCache cache, Object key, TItem& value)
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.CompiledQueryCache.GetOrAddQuery[TResult](Object cacheKey, Func`1 compiler) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/Internal/CompiledQueryCache.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.QueryCompiler.Execute[TResult](Expression query) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/Internal/QueryCompiler.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.EntityQueryProvider.Execute[TResult](Expression expression) in /_/src/EFCore/Query/Internal/EntityQueryProvider.cs
   at Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.Internal.EntityQueryable`1.GetEnumerator() in /_/src/EFCore/Query/Internal/EntityQueryable`.cs
   at System.Collections.Generic.List`1..ctor(IEnumerable`1 collection) in /_/src/libraries/System.Private.CoreLib/src/System/Collections/Generic/List.cs
   at System.Linq.Enumerable.ToList[TSource](IEnumerable`1 source) in /_/src/libraries/System.Linq/src/System/Linq/ToCollection.cs
   at Program.<Main>$(String[] args) in Program.cs
```

EF Core version: 6.0.5
Database provider: Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer
Target framework: .NET 6.0
